main event: Colored objects, oval flying in straight line for several seconds were observed by ground-radar and air-intercept radar near Denver, Colorado.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a distant travel, high speed, and fantastic motion.
The objects were observed in a triangular formation.
The objects faded after about 12 seconds of observation.
The sighting was also observed by naked eye, in addition to radar.
There were numerous previous reports of meteor observations in the area.
